fixes.issue: Arrow key selector creating duplicate lines on each keypress
fixes.resolution: Rewrote Select-Option to use carriage return for same-line redraw, hide cursor during selection

fixes.issue: [C] claudeModified badge not clearing when user marks new status
fixes.resolution: Added PSObject.Properties.Remove('claudeModified') to all status update paths

fixes.issue: No action menu showing after selecting item from results
fixes.resolution: Added try/catch around detail loading, ensured action menu always displays with fallback data
Auto-copies action items to clipboard using Set-Clipboard

fixes.issue: Note field displayed inline without formatting for multi-line content
fixes.resolution: Added dedicated NOTE section with header, divider lines, and line-by-line output for multi-line notes

fixes.issue: Only showing dates with no useful data
fixes.resolution: Added subject name/scoped_id, user who performed action, seen/archived status, pagination info, and numbered list

fixes.issue: Need vendor detail selection after list and pagination
fixes.resolution: Added pagination (N/P navigation), return-to-list after viewing details, try/catch on initial load, pretty-printed notes

fixes.issue: TestNote described launcher UI bug, not script issue
fixes.resolution: Reviewed script - works correctly. TestNote was about launcher arrow-key selector bug which was fixed in YoPrint-Launcher-v2.ps1 on 2026-01-07

fixes.issue: TestNote says no action after selection, but this was already fixed on 2026-01-07
fixes.resolution: Reviewed script - action menu exists and works (Open in browser, Copy ID, Back, New search, Quit). TestNote is outdated.

fixes.issue: User wanted to know which webhook endpoints are actually live/reachable
fixes.resolution: Added [H] Health check option that tests each webhook URL with HEAD request (5s timeout), shows LIVE/RESPONDS/DEAD status and summary count

fixes.issue: Asked for webhook ID immediately without showing what webhooks exist
fixes.resolution: Now loads and displays all webhooks first with selection by number, shows current values, press Enter to keep existing value

fixes.issue: Service names not showing, no option to display in terminal
fixes.resolution: Added fallback name detection (service.name, name, title, ID), added 3 options: save to Downloads, display in terminal with pagination, or both

fixes.issue: Corrupted test note (just showed divider line)
fixes.resolution: Reviewed script - works correctly, no code changes needed. TestNote was corrupted during input.

fixes.issue: Asked for approval ID without showing available approvals, endpoint returned 404
fixes.resolution: Now tries approval/search endpoint to list approvals first, then select by number. Falls back with helpful error message if search endpoint doesn't exist.

fixes.issue: Used 'id' instead of 'scoped_id' in scoped_id_search (known API gotcha)
fixes.resolution: Fixed to use 'scoped_id' parameter, added PO prefix auto-formatting, added exact match filtering for fuzzy search results

fixes.issue: Asked for webhook ID without showing available webhooks
fixes.resolution: Now loads webhook list first with selection by number, better error handling for log endpoint (may be YoPrint API limitation)

fixes.issue: Asked for feed item IDs without showing available items
fixes.resolution: Now loads archived feed items first, shows list with dates/types, allows selection by number or 'all', handles single/multi item JSON properly
